name: Backpack
note: Carry 2 additional items

name: Torches
note: 3 count, snap-light, burns for 1 scene

name: Climbing Gear
note: Ignore penalties on Climbing rolls

name: Mining Kit
note: Exploring or excavation times cut in half

name: Cold Weather Fur
note: Ignore penalties from normal cold or snow

name: Diving Gear
note: 2 dive helms, spearguns, fins, marker buoy

name: Lockpicks
note: Cannot pick locks without these tools

name: Sack of Bearings
note: A pouch of 3 dozen metal balls

name: Flint & Steel
note: Camp with comfort and cozy fire

name: Scribe’s Kit
note: Parchment book, charcoal sticks

name: Craftsman’s Tools
note: Hammer, spanner, and bits for simple work

name: Bandage Kit
note: 3 count, heal 1 crossed off skill

name: Oil Flask
note: 3 count, flammable liquid, glass phial

name: Rope
note: 50’ length, breaks on crit fail usage

name: Iron Chain
note: 15’ length, all but unbreakable

name: Snare Kit
note: 3 count, catch small animals

name: Bear Trap
note: 1 count, Muscle to escape

name: Caltrops
note: 3 uses, spiked floor-scatter, inflicts D4

name: Powder Kit
note: 1 Firearm never empty, ruined if wet

name: Horse
note: Transports 2 people at 4x walking speed

name: Cart
note: Holds crates and barrels filled with goods

name: Wagon
note: Transports like a cart, at horse speed

name: War Wagon
note: An armored wagon for siege

name: Small Boat
note: Holds 4 people, barely seaworthy, sneaky

name: Mast Ship
note: Crew of 3 required, 2 masts, huge hold

name: House
note: A cozy place to live, deed for life

name: Fort or Garrison
note: Wooden Defense position with pole-fences

name: Castle
note: A series of keeps and towers, stone

name: Fortress
note: A massive, impregnable castle on a cliff
